items.sentence: My son surprised me by tidying up his room without being told.
My heart skipped a beat when my wife told me she was pregnant.
After spending three years in prison, Tom was happy to be out.
Tom spent the whole time worrying about what Mary might think.
I need to spend a little time on the phone before I can leave.
I didn't think that Tom would know how to do that, but he did.
No matter how hard we try, we'll never be able to satisfy Tom.
Some people seemed to have trouble understanding Tom's French.
As soon as the bell rang, the teacher came into the classroom.
I don't know about the past, but now we have faxes and emails.
